title: The Magic of Cooking
description:
Jennifer has always loved cooking up new creations, but had no idea that time spent in the kitchen would lead to a new and better life.

Follow Jennifer Crawford on Instagram and see more on their website

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
